languages.text: {n}Некоторое время вы слышите лишь тишину, но потом сквозь нее прорывается стук. Ритмичные удары, что становятся все громче. Тысячи ног ударяют в палубы, словно маршируют за вами прямо в Преисподнюю.{/n}

{n}For a while, you hear no response. Then the silence is broken by the sound of heavy footfalls. The rhythmic stomping grows louder and louder. Thousands of feet strike the decks as if marching into oblivion under your banner.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Некоторое время вы слышите лишь тишину, но потом сквозь нее прорывается стук. Ритмичные удары, что становятся все громче. Тысячи ног ударяют в палубы, словно маршируют за вами прямо в Преисподнюю.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}For some time you hear nothing but silence. However, soon knocking breaks through it. Rhythmic strikes that become louder and louder. Thousands of feet strike the decks as if following you in a march right into the depths of Hell.{/n}

{n}For some time you hear nothing but silence. However, soon knocking breaks through it. Rhythmic strikes that become louder and louder. Thousands of feet strike the decks as if following you in a march right into the depths of Hell.{/n}

{n}For some time, you hear nothing but silence. However, soon a rapping breaks through it. The rhythmic strikes are becoming louder and louder. Thousands of feet strike the decks as if marching into the depths of Hell under your banner.{/n}

{n}For some time, you hear nothing but silence. However, soon a rapping breaks through it. The rhythmic strikes are becoming louder and louder. Thousands of feet strike the decks as if marching into the depths of Hell under your banner.{/n}

{n}For a while, you hear no response. Then the silence is broken by the sound of heavy footfalls. The rhythmic stomping grows louder and louder. Thousands of feet strike the decks as if marching into oblivion under your banner.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一段时间之内，音阵频道鸦雀无声。然而很快，一连串沉重的脚步声便打破了寂静。随后，节奏声变得越发响亮，甲板上成千上万的脚步声如雷鸣般轰响，在你的旗帜下向虚空深处进军。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a while, you hear no response. Then the silence is broken by the sound of heavy footfalls. The rhythmic stomping grows louder and louder. Thousands of feet strike the decks as if marching into oblivion under your banner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一段时间之内，音阵频道鸦雀无声。然而很快，一连串沉重的脚步声便打破了寂静。随后，节奏声变得越发响亮，甲板上成千上万的脚步声如雷鸣般轰响，在你的旗帜下向虚空深处进军。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La réponse se fait attendre, mais au bout d'un certain temps, le silence est interrompu par des bruits de pas. Le battement rythmique se fait de plus en plus intense. Des milliers de pieds martèlent les ponts comme s'ils s'engageaient sur la voie de la perdition à la suite de votre bannière.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a while, you hear no response. Then the silence is broken by the sound of heavy footfalls. The rhythmic stomping grows louder and louder. Thousands of feet strike the decks as if marching into oblivion under your banner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La réponse se fait attendre, mais au bout d'un certain temps, le silence est interrompu par des bruits de pas. Le battement rythmique se fait de plus en plus intense. Des milliers de pieds martèlent les ponts comme s'ils s'engageaient sur la voie de la perdition à la suite de votre bannière.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hörst eine Weile lang keine Reaktion. Dann wird die Stille durch den Klang schwerer Schritte durchbrochen. Die rhythmischen Schläge werden lauter und lauter. Tausende von Füßen auf den Decks stampfen, als würden sie unter deinem Banner ins ewige Nichts marschieren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a while, you hear no response. Then the silence is broken by the sound of heavy footfalls. The rhythmic stomping grows louder and louder. Thousands of feet strike the decks as if marching into oblivion under your banner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hörst eine Weile lang keine Reaktion. Dann wird die Stille durch den Klang schwerer Schritte durchbrochen. Die rhythmischen Schläge werden lauter und lauter. Tausende von Füßen auf den Decks stampfen, als würden sie unter deinem Banner ins ewige Nichts marschieren.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Por un momento no recibes respuesta. Después, el sonido de unas pisadas rompe el silencio. Los rítmicos pisotones se intensifican. Miles de pies golpean las cubiertas, marchando hacia la aniquilación bajo tu mando.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a while, you hear no response. Then the silence is broken by the sound of heavy footfalls. The rhythmic stomping grows louder and louder. Thousands of feet strike the decks as if marching into oblivion under your banner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por un momento no recibes respuesta. Después, el sonido de unas pisadas rompe el silencio. Los rítmicos pisotones se intensifican. Miles de pies golpean las cubiertas, marchando hacia la aniquilación bajo tu mando.{/n}

languages.text: {n} しばらくの間、何の反応もなかった。その静寂が、重い足音によって破られた。リズミカルな足音はますます大きくなっていき、何千もの足があなたの旗の下、忘却の彼方へと行進するかのようにデッキを鳴らした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a while, you hear no response. Then the silence is broken by the sound of heavy footfalls. The rhythmic stomping grows louder and louder. Thousands of feet strike the decks as if marching into oblivion under your banner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n} しばらくの間、何の反応もなかった。その静寂が、重い足音によって破られた。リズミカルな足音はますます大きくなっていき、何千もの足があなたの旗の下、忘却の彼方へと行進するかのようにデッキを鳴らした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir müddet çıt çıkmıyor. Ardından sert adımların gümbürtüleriyle bu sessizlik bozuluyor. Ritim içinde yankılanan adımların sesi yükseldikçe yükseliyor. Binlerce taban, âdeta sancağının altında felakete yürüyormuşçasına güvertelere çarpıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a while, you hear no response. Then the silence is broken by the sound of heavy footfalls. The rhythmic stomping grows louder and louder. Thousands of feet strike the decks as if marching into oblivion under your banner.{/n}
